entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
